title: New York Gov. Kathy Hochul Imposes Mask Mandate for Indoor Places
sub_head: The state mandate for places without a vaccine mandate goes into effect early next week and will be re-evaluated in mid-January
body:
New York Gov. Kathy Hochul said New Yorkers must wear masks in public indoor places unless those places require people to be vaccinated against Covid-19.
The requirement goes into effect Dec. 13 and lasts until Jan. 15, the state said Friday. The state said it would re-evaluate the policy after that time.
